textBeforeTable: A number of people from the Linux/390 mailing list have given presentations on various aspects of Linux and Linux/390. When those presenters give their permission, we place copies of those presentations here, with the most recent ones at the top. Anyone who would like to have a copy of their presentation placed here, please contact Mark Post   Miscellaneous (Unrelated to any specific date) Cast of characters Credits User Friendly Ubersoft Fun Kernel Trap Linux World Linux Today Linux Journal Linux Weekly News News Linux/390 Survey Results Linux/390 Subscribers Linux/390 Presentations Linux-390 Listserv Community Members Community linuxvm.org Archives i/370 Port, aka Bigfoot Linux/390 at Princeton University Top 10 reasons to run Linux on VM Notes & Observations Linux man pages IBM VM and Linux Resources Distribution Contents IBM's Linux/390 pages Linux/390 HOWTOs Large numbers of links Information Hercules - An S/390 Hardware Emulator Linux/390 Patches Linux/390 Distributions
